page.title: 19Craigie's Tennis Hope.
page.content: I am a member of{Darnhall Tennis Club and I am the Under 16 boys' singles champion there.I{started playing}when I was {8 years old. }I had my first Tennis lessons from the S.L.T.A.,then I got through to special{Winter coach- {ing}with Douglas Gibson{(S.L.T.A.). I practice about six nights a week.I have been to {Largs in Inverclyde}for sifting to see if I could be in the boys Under 12{Scottish Squad. My other successes are being number three seed in the{Perth and District Tennis Tournament where I was beaten in the Quarter-Finals by the number two seed. I own a Prince J/r Pro. and a Sondico Pro.Tennis racquet and a Prince bag.If I make the Scottish Squad, I hope that I might one day play on the Centre Court at{Wimbledon.}By the way,{Steven {Christie}is the name to watch.
